snippet: The resettlement offers would be limited to people who have fled war or persecution, an Australian official said.
abstract: Australian officials announce Papua New Guinea will start resettling refugees held in camps there; statement emphasizes that only those classified as refugees will be offered resettlement in Papua New Guinea, and is explicit that no refugees will be resettled in Australia; Australia's use of offshore detention centers in Papua New Guinea and elsewhere has received heavy criticism from international community.
lead_paragraph: The resettlement offers would be limited to people who have fled war or persecution, an Australian official said.

headline.print_headline: Papua New Guinea to Resettle Refugees Detained by Australia
headline.main: Papua New Guinea to Resettle Refugees From Australian Detention Center
